concept.title: Run test suites/test suite collections with TestCloud in Katalon Runtime Engine

conbody.p: To integrate TestCloud with KRE and configure TestCloud Tunnel, use the following Katalonc command-line options:

row.entry:
The ID of the environment which corresponds to a combination of OS, browser type and browser version to execute.
Note: This parameter already contains the information about the browser type. Therefore, the browserType parameter is not generated in this integration.
Allow the execution to be performed via a tunnel.

ul.li: To get the TestCloud environment ID, open Katalon Studio and use the command builder. See: Generate Command with Command Builder.
